item.title: FAQ
item.description:
Answers to common questions about SeedStack.

How is SeedStack licensed ?

SeedStack code is licensed under the Mozilla Public License 2.0. The documentation is licensed under the Creative Commons Share-Alike 4.0 license.

Can I use the Web Framework without the Java Framework ?

Yes, the Web and Java frameworks are independent and can be used separately. Various projects are already using W20 with other backend technologies, such as PHP or even Perl.

How to get help for a SeedStack related problem ?

If you have any question or problem please use StackOverflow and make sure to tag your question with seedstack. You can also use the Google Group or directly the mailing list via seedstack@googlegroups.com. We are available on the Freenode IRC community, at #seedstack.

Can I contribute to the project ?

Sure. We would love to accept contributions. Here is a guide explaining how to contribute.

Your FAQ is weak. It did not answer my question.

Open an issue on the website repository or ask us directly on IRC at #seedstack or on the Google Group.
